General.Name: Founder Technology Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Founder Technology Group Co.,Ltd. provides hardware and software solutions in China. It researches, develops, produces, manufactures, and sells high-density interconnection boards, multi-layer boards, soft-rigid boards, and other customized PCB products for the mobile smart terminals, 5G wireless communication base stations, data centers, optical modules, industrial control, medical care, smart vehicle products and wearable consumer electronics, and other fields. In addition, the company provides application solutions and system integration services for banks, insurance companies, securities companies, and other financial institutions; technology services to the transportation sector; and automatic fare collection system. Further, it offers consulting services to government agencies; and education products and solutions. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Shanghai, China.
